p: In addition to that, Sangai and Verma [ 46] found that BPA-caused changes in the activities of ATPase in liver of mice thereby causing a reduction in ATP produced in the cell which lead to necrosis. It has been reported that BPA produce ROS that caused brain, reproductive tract and kidney oxidative damage [ 47, 48]. Furthermore, the great histopathological changes in testes tissues caused by BPA estrogenic activity [ 17].
